summary: Comprehensive testing of Principal Supervisor features completed. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all new pages and features are working correctly: Session Recordings, Daily Reports, Business & Payments pages with all 3 tabs.
critical_code_review_comments: All Principal Supervisor APIs are properly implemented with authentication, error handling, and data validation
Frontend pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing (recordings-btn, daily-reports-btn, business-btn)
Business page correctly shows 3 tabs: Business Overview, Observer Payments, My Earnings
All pages handle empty data states gracefully with appropriate messages
seed_data_creation: Used existing seed data: 2 Students (Aarav Kumar, Priya Sharma), 1 Observer (Priya Desai - ₹100/session), Principal consultation rate ₹500/session
context_for_next_testing_agent: Principal Supervisor features fully functional. All new pages working: 1) Session Recordings (/principal/recordings) - shows status cards, recordings list, review panel, 2) Daily Reports (/principal/daily-reports) - shows status cards, Observer Reports/AI Insights tabs, review panel, 3) Business (/principal/business) - shows summary cards, 3 tabs (Business Overview, Observer Payments, My Earnings). Backend APIs all return correct data structures. No recordings/reports data in DB yet - pages handle empty states correctly.

features_tested.principal_login: PASS - Login with principal@greenwood.edu/principal123 works, returns access_token
features_tested.principal_dashboard: PASS - Shows statistics (2 students, 2 active, 1 observer), 6 Supervisor Action buttons visible
features_tested.session_recordings_page: PASS - Shows status cards (Pending Review, Approved, Flagged, All Recordings), recordings list, review panel
features_tested.daily_reports_page: PASS - Shows status cards, Observer Reports/AI Insights tabs, review panel
features_tested.business_page_overview: PASS - Shows Business Metrics (Premium/Standard Children, Monthly Revenue, Sessions), Your Team section with observers
features_tested.business_page_observer_payments: PASS - Shows payment summary (Total Sessions, Total Earned, Total Paid, Pending), observer payment details with status
features_tested.business_page_my_earnings: PASS - Shows Consultation Rate, Consultations Completed, Total Earnings, Paid/Pending, Monthly Breakdown
features_tested.api_session_recordings: PASS - Returns recordings list with status_counts
features_tested.api_daily_reports: PASS - Returns reports list with status_counts and ai_insights
features_tested.api_business_summary: PASS - Returns principal info, business_metrics, team info
features_tested.api_observer_payments: PASS - Returns observer_payments list with summary
features_tested.api_my_earnings: PASS - Returns principal earnings with monthly_breakdown

api_endpoints_tested: GET /api/principal/daily-reports - Daily reports with AI insights
GET /api/principal/business-summary - Business metrics and team info
